data.actual_result: Clyde shows your previous nickname as a mention.
data.expected_result: Clyde's message should show your new username raw as the <@URID>
data.short_description: Setting your nick to you id mention makes Clyde show your old nick
data.steps_to_repro: - Give yourself any nickname on a server - Use /nick <@URID> - Observe the message Clyde sends
